attributes.title: You Can Manifest What You Want By Your Sheer Iccha Shakti (Desire Power) || 04 Feb 2021 || Satsang
attributes.description:
4 FEBRUARY 2021
*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:
*DUE TO MY SIMPLE LOVE, MY OWN LIFE HAS MANIFESTED AS LIFE IN ALL OF YOU. 
*THE MOST PRECIOUS THING YOU HAVE IS YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS - LIFE.
*IT CAN BE MOULDED, MANIFESTED AS YOU WANT JUST BY YOUR ICCHA SHAKTI.
*YOU NEED ACTION POWER (KRIYA SHAKTI) ONLY TO ENJOY IT, NOT TO MANIFEST IT.
*WHAT YOU WANT CAN BE MANIFESTED, JUST BY YOUR SHEER INTENSE DESIRE (ICCHA SHAKTI). YOUR KRIYA SHAKTI (ACTION POWER) IS REQUIRED ONLY TO CELEBRATE / ENJOY IT.
*LET ME EXPLAIN MORE CLEARLY AND STRAIGHT:
*YOU WANT A HEALTHY BODY TO ENJOY THIS WORLD. THAT CAN BE ACHIEVED JUST BY SHEER INTENSE DESIRE (ICCHA SHAKTI)
*SHEER INTENSE DESIRE  (ICCHA SHAKTI) IS CAPABLE OF TRIGGERING / MANIFESTING KRIYA SHAKTI (ACTION).
*MY SWEET, SIMPLE LOVE TO ALL OF YOU IS THE REASON I AM REVEALING THIS DEEP SACRED SECRET. I AM ABSOLUTELY INTEGRATED TO MY LOVE TO ALL OF YOU.
*MY INTEGRITY TO MY LOVE FOR ALL OF YOU IS THE ONLY REASON I AM COMING AND SITTING HERE. OTHERWISE I HAVE NOTHING TO GAIN.
*JUST NOW I GOT UP FROM MY SAMADHI, I AM TAKING A VERY NICE TEA WITHOUT MILK WITH GINGER, CLOVE AND ALL THE HERBS! I MAKE THE CLOVE AS A PASTE AND BRUSH MY TEETH WITH IT ALSO.
*MY LIFE IS EXTREMELY PEACEFUL, HAPPY, SIMPLE, JOYFUL! 
*YOU CAN SEE VERY CLEARLY THESE VIBHUTI MARKS AND KNOW THAT I JUST NOW HAD MY SHOWER AND PUJA.DURING THE SHOWER ITSELF I WILL DO MY ATMAARTHA PUJA.
*I AM ABSOLUTELY PEACEFUL IN MY SAMADHI. THE ONLY REASON I COME AND TALK TO ALL OF YOU IS MY SIMPLE LOVE AND INTEGRITY TO ALL OF YOU.
*ONE OF THE BIGGEST PROBLEM IS, ALL HUMAN BEINGS FEEL THAT THEY NEED TO DO LOT OF ACTIONS (KRIYA SHAKTI), TO ACHIEVE ANYTHING THEY WANT - WHETHER HEALTH, WEALTH, ENLIGHTENMENT OR POWERS. THAT IS A DELUSION. 
*YOU NEED SHEER ICCHA SHAKTI - WILL - DESIRE, THAT'S IT.
*THE DESIRE ITSELF IS CAPABLE OF MANIFESTING KRIYA; THE ACTION POWER.
THREE THINGS:
1. ICCHA SHAKTI - YOUR POWERS TO DESIRE - WILL
2. KRIYA SHAKTI - POWER TO WORK INTENSELY AND MANIFEST
3. JNANA SHAKTI - POWER OF ENLIGHTENMENT, KNOWLEDGE
*FOR HEALTH, YOU THINK, ‘O! I HAVE TO GET UP AND DO YOGA, STRETCH MY BODY. ONLY THEN I CAN HAVE HEALTH. IF I WANT WEALTH, I HAVE TO GO TO OFFICE AND WORK LIKE A DOG DAY AND NIGHT. ONLY THEN I CAN HAVE WEALTH.’ 
*FIRST OF ALL UNDERSTAND: NO DOG WORKS!
*IT IS ACTUALLY DELUSION.
*YOUR SHEER POWER TO DESIRE, ICCHA SHAKTI, GIVES 99.999 % SUCCESS.
*YOUR KRIYA (ACTION POWER) THAT IS  NEEDED IS TOO SMALL.
*WHEN YOU ARE TERRORISED, YOU WILL SEE ONLY FRIGHTENING NEGATIVITY ALL AROUND YOU. YOU WILL LOSE TRUST ON EVERYTHING INCLUDING THE GURU AND YOURSELF.
*WHEN YOU FALL IN LOVE, EVEN STUPID CHEATING GIRLFRIEND / BOYFRIEND WILL LOOK LIKE GOD.
*SO YOUR OPINIONS ARE DELUSION. 
*DON'T BUILD YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS, YOUR LIFE, BASED ON YOUR OPINIONS. BUILD IT BASED ON TRUE WISDOM / KNOWLEDGE / RIGHT UNDERSTANDING ABOUT LIFE.
*TAKE THE EXAMPLE OF YOUR HEALTH - THE MOST IMPORTANT THING. APPLY THIS PRINCIPLE IN EVERY ASPECT OF YOUR LIFE.
*YOU ALWAYS THINK IF YOU NEED HEALTH, YOU NEED TO DO YOGA, GYM, DIET. YOU THINK TOO MANY THINGS ARE INVOLVED IN YOUR HEALTH AND THE MOMENT YOU THINK ABOUT ALL THE ACTIONS YOU NEED TO DO, YOU GET TIRED AND YOU GIVE UP ON YOUR IDEA ABOUT YOUR HEALTH.
*ACTUALLY, THE ONLY THING YOU NEED FOR YOUR HEALTH IS YOUR WILLPOWER, DESIRE - TO BE HEALTHY. JUST GO ON BUILDING THAT.
*IMAGINE YOU ALREADY HAVE A HEALTHY BODY. THIK: ‘AH! HOW IT FEELS TO BE HEALTHY, BEAUTIFUL, SHINING, GLOWING, HAPPY, YOUTHFUL, ENERGETIC BODY!’
*IF LIFE IS INFUSED INTO YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS IN THE FORM OF ICCHA SHAKTI (DESIRE), 99.999 % OF THE WORK IS DONE.
*YOUR ACTIONS ARE NEEDED ONLY TO ENJOY WHAT YOU WANT THROUGH THAT HEALTHY BODY.
*I AM NOT DISRESPECTING KRIYA SHAKTI (ACTION). I AM ONLY SAYING, YOUR DELUSION ABOUT KRIYA SHAKTI PUTS YOU IN TIREDNESS, BOREDOM, FRUSTRATION, LIFE NEGATIVITY - THAT IS WHAT IS WRONG.
*TO MANY OF MY OWN DISCIPLES: YOUR SHEER DELUSION, FEAR, PUTS YOU IN LIFE NEGATIVITY, FRUSTRATION AND DUE TO THAT YOU ACTUALLY DESTROY YOUR HEALTH AND LOSE YOUR LIFE.
*FILL YOURSELF WITH INTENSE DESIRE FOR HEALTH - ICCHA SHAKTI.

Read More At: https://www.facebook.com/ParamahamsaNithyananda/posts/4857032407717904



Get Your Free E-Passport at join.kailaasa.org and receive all the gifts to live enlightenment!
